title: Bonnie Tyler-The Essentials (2 CD)
description:
Hello ladies and gentlemen,this is my third upload:)... Bonnie Tyler is my TOP favourite singer EVER.I find her songs and,of course,her voice amazing.But unfortunately,although there are billions of Bonnie Tyler compilations out there,I don't think they do her justice,either because they focus on a specific part of her career or because they miss some important songs. So,this time, I created a 2 CD compilation of songs that I consider essential Bonnie Tyler tracks.Once again,all songs are in their album versions. 

TRACKLIST

CD1
01.Lost in France
02.More than a lover
03.It's a heartache
04.The world is full of married men
05.My guns are loaded
06.Sitting on the edge of the ocean
07.Total eclipse of the heart
08.Faster than the speed of night
09.Have you ever seen the rain
10.Straight from the heart
11.A rockin' good way(To mess around and fall in love)
12.Here she comes
13.Matter of the heart
14.If you were a woman(and I was a man)
15.Loving you's a dirty job(but somebody's gotta do it)
16.Holding out for a hero
TOTAL RUNTIME: Approximately 74 minutes

CD2
01.Ravishing
02.Islands
03.Hide your heart
04.To love somebody
05.Bitterblue
06.Against the wind
07.Fool's lullaby
08.Race to the fire
09.Sally comes around
10.Say goodbye
11.Limelight
12.Two out of three ain't bad
13.Making love out of nothing at all
14.Tyre tracks and broken hearts
15.Si demain(Turn around)
16.Believe in me
TOTAL RUNTIME: Approximately 77 minutes

All songs are in MP3,320 kbps format.There are also 2 M3U-lists(one for each CD) and two album covers,both made by me:D
Once again,I'm asking you to comment after downloading,to tell me whether you liked my compilation or not,and if you liked it,to seed.

Hope you have a really nice time:)
